SEARCH
Package application

Class Chat

java.lang.Object
application.Chat
public class Chat extends Object
Represents a single message within a chat room, containing information about the sender's role, username, the message content, and the chat room in which it is posted.

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Chat(int id, int roomId, String role, String userName, String content)

    Constructs a new Chat message without an explicit ID, to be used when creating a new message in the database.

  • Constructor Details

    • Chat

      public Chat(int roomId, String role, String userName, String content)
      Constructs a new Chat message without an explicit ID, to be used when creating a new message in the database.
      Parameters:
      roomId - the ID of the chat room this message is associated with
      role - the role of the sender (e.g., Staff, Instructor)
      userName - the username of the sender
      content - the content of the message

    • Chat

      public Chat(int id, int roomId, String role, String userName, String content)
      Constructs a new Chat message with an explicit ID, typically used when loading a message from the database.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique ID of the chat message
      roomId - the ID of the chat room this message is associated with
      role - the role of the sender (e.g., Staff, Instructor)
      userName - the username of the sender
      content - the content of the message

  • Method Details

    • getId

      public int getId()
      Returns the unique ID of this chat message.
      Returns:
      the chat message's ID

    • getRoomId

      public int getRoomId()
      Returns the chat room ID associated with this message.
      Returns:
      the chat room ID

    • getRole

      public String getRole()
      Returns the role (Staff or Instructor) of the user who posted this message.
      Returns:
      the sender's role

    • getUserName

      public String getUserName()
      Returns the username of the individual who posted this message.
      Returns:
      the sender's username

    • getContent

      public String getContent()
      Returns the content of this chat message.
      Returns:
      the text of the message

    • create

      public void create(DatabaseHelper dbHelper) throws SQLException
      Inserts this Chat message into the database (creating a new record). On success, the generated primary key is set on this Chat object's ID field.
      Parameters:
      dbHelper - the DatabaseHelper used to obtain a database connection
      Throws:
      SQLException - if inserting the Chat message fails or no rows are affected

    • readAllForChatRoom

      public static List<Chat> readAllForChatRoom(DatabaseHelper dbHelper, int roomId) throws SQLException
      Loads all Chat messages belonging to a specific chat room from the database.
      Parameters:
      dbHelper - the DatabaseHelper used to obtain a database connection
      roomId - the ID of the chat room whose messages should be loaded
      Returns:
      a List of Chat objects for the given chat room, ordered by ascending ID
      Throws:
      SQLException - if a database access error occurs
